### 历年中考完形填空核心短语

- when it comes to ...
- make a wish
- the finish line
- up and down
- come over
- stay healthy
- no more than
- have a lot to do with
- be home to
- the rest of
- agree with
- come time
- learn from
- mental illness
- little by little
- over time
